name: ResponsiveAds
tag_list: responsive-web-design, cross-media, cross-channel-advertising, mobile-advertising, tablet-advertising, desktop-advertising
overview:
Responsiveads is the next generation advertising company for the Responsive Web ( Responsive Web Design or Adaptive Web is a fluid site that adapts to any screen)

The company is in private beta, with a first product called RAFT(tm) -Responsive Ad Framework Technology, that focuses on Publishers to be able manages seamlessly multi-screen advertising. Publishers can use the product as a framework to leverage existing ad-tags, own ad-server tags for delivery across every screen configuration and have one place to manage everything. From Ad server, Ad Networks, Affiliate Tags, RichMedia Creatives, etc…

A new product recently added to the private beta is called STRETCH(tm) that enables publishers with ad sales to create Responsive Creatives to adapt to all screens. The product is also being offered to brands/agencies to create a one-ad-tag creative that works everywhere ( mobile, tablet, desktop)
